channel.title: react on rudra narayan
channel.description: Recent content in react on rudra narayan

item.title: GatsbyJs: An overkill for a static site generator
item.description: Table of Contents So what went wrong? My new workflow Conclusion So I have been using Gatsby for almost two years now. I have built a nice looking and fast blog with 15 odd posts. With Gatsby I got PWA is out of the box, the component’s are written in react, I can query my post data from graphQL and so many other goodies.

item.title: Setting up (Neo)vim for React development
item.description: Table of Contents Syntax Highlighting Linters and Formatters Autocompletion Commenting Conclusion It’s been 8 months since I have been using (neo)vim as my primary text editor. Initially it was incredibly tough to adopt and use it in work. Well that would be another story to tell. Back then I was working mostly in backend using CoffeeScript (I know ðŸ™ˆ).
